text: The 1957 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 24th edition of the women's singles championship. Fujie Eguchi defeated Ann Haydon in the final by three sets to two, to win the title. ==Seeds== # Tomi Okawa # Angelica Rozeanu # Fujie Eguchi # Ann Haydon # Gizi Farkas # Kiiko Watanabe # Ella Zeller # Éva Kóczián # Ermelinde Wertl # Diane Rowe # Yoshio Tanaka # Helen Elliot # Christiane Watel ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1957 in women's table tennis
title: 1957 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
